answerText: Lord Byron[10] Byron wrote the poem The Lament of this author, which discusses this poet's stay in St. Anna's hospital. This man wrote a play in which Aminta saves Silvia from a satyr as well as an epic poem where Tancred accidentally kills his love Clorinda.
heading: VCU Closed  |2013 | Chicago A + Illinois B  | 15 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: He wrote that Keats was "kill'd off by one critique" in a poem where the title character encounters the ghost of the Black Friar. For 10 points each: [10] Name this Romantic author, who described the promiscuous Don Juan. He also wrote "She Walks in Beauty."
